text.section: No person shall aid or abet any child to escape from any home established under the provisions of this chapter or harbor or conceal any such child, knowing that the child has so escaped.
The board shall reclaim and bring back to the home any escaped children, and the peace officers of this state shall apprehend and return such children to the home, at the expense of the home.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-16.
